channel.title: Zelda on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Zelda on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Legend of Zelda’ Live-Action Movie Finds Its Zelda and Link
item.description: Nintendo boss Shigeru Miyamoto said on Wednesday that Bo Bragason will star as the titular character, with Benjamin Evan Ainsworth playing Link.
